trans-unit.source: Provides the command adapter class for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供命令适配器类，用于 cHTML 适配器集。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This class requires a form tag for form submission.
trans-unit.target: 此类要求提交窗体的窗体标记。

trans-unit.source: Since cHTML devices do not support JavaScript, they cannot render links for postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 由于 cHTML 设备不支持 JavaScript，它们不能呈现为回发的链接。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlCommandAdapter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Writes additional attributes that are specific to an adapter.
trans-unit.target: 写入特定于适配器的其他属性。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the adapter generates markup that requires <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Form>" name="<Form>" href=""></xref> tags for form submission.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示适配器是否生成需要的标记<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Form>" name="<Form>" href=""></xref>提交窗体的标记。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the adapter generates markup that requires **<Form>** tags for form submission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果适配器生成需要的标记**<窗体>**标记的窗体提交; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
